title: Preet Gill – 2021 Comments on the Government’s Afghanistan Aid Announcement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Preet Gill, the Shadow Secretary of State for International Development on 3 September 2021.
content:
While this latest U-turn to return to 2019 levels for Afghanistan is welcome, the savage cuts already imposed by this government on the Afghan people have caused untold damage.
